display_long_description:
"Last Chance: The Survivor" is a VR-based action-shooter game that chronicles the gripping journey of Gabriel, starting as a scientist in an army laboratory and continuing as a father searching for his daughter in a post-apocalyptic world. Following a devastating catastrophe that has ravaged the world, Gabriel focuses on one sole purpose in his ruined life: finding his lost daughter. During this journey, Gabriel faces the challenges of a broken world, enduring both physical and emotional battles.

Features:

Realistic VR Experience:
High-quality graphics and fluid VR mechanics for an immersive post-apocalyptic experience. Interact naturally with a world full of interactive objects and realistic physics.

Strategic Combat:
Diverse weapons for varied strategies. Defeat enemies using environmental tactics and smart resource management.

Diverse Zombies:
Face different types of zombies, each requiring unique combat approaches. From swift attackers to more formidable foes, adapt your strategy to survive.

Highscore Mode:
Endless action in Highscore Mode. Aim for high scores against increasing zombie waves. Tests shooting skills, quick thinking, and agility.

Versions: 
1.0.3 - 'Highscore' and 'Training' modes are currently playable. New modes coming soon! Thanks for your feedback and support!
